blackengine.gameLogic.components.prefab

Class CameraComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • blackengine.gameLogic.components.base.ComponentBase
      • blackengine.gameLogic.components.prefab.CameraComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Camera

    public class CameraComponent
extends ComponentBase
implements Camera
    An implementation of this component can function as a camera that can be used to render from a POV. It is required to register this component to the LogicEngine, as the update method itself handles the creation of the view matrix. In general, this components update() method should be called after all other components, as the camera position may be dependent on their implementation. This means this component should be registered with a low priority to the LogicEngine. On activate(), this implementation of CameraComponent will be set as the main camera from which the POV renderers will render. On deactivate(), if this camera was the main camera in the RenderEngine, it will now be set to null.
